SELECT E.mail_no, P.emp_email, P.emp_name, P.role_code, P.dept_code, E.mail_title, E.mail_status, E.mail_date FROM HR_EMAIL AS E JOIN HR_EMPLOYEES AS P ON E.MAIL_TO = P.EMP_NO
WHERE E.mail_to = #{empNo} AND E.MAIL_STATUS = 'Y'
WHERE E.mail_to = #{empNo} AND E.MAIL_STATUS = 'N'
ORDER BY E.mail_no desc LIMIT #{s.pageLimitNum},#{s.mailAmount}

SELECT he1.EMP_NO AS senderEmpNo, he1.EMP_EMAIL AS senderEmail, he2.EMP_NO AS receiverEmpNo, he2.EMP_EMAIL AS receiverEmail, hp.pos_name, hd.DEPT_Name AS receiverDeptName, he.MAIL_TITLE AS mailTitle, he.MAIL_CONTENT AS mailContent, he.MAIL_DATE AS mailDate FROM HR_EMAIL he JOIN HR_EMPLOYEES he1 ON he1.EMP_NO = he.MAIL_FROM JOIN HR_EMPLOYEES he2 ON he2.EMP_NO = he.MAIL_TO JOIN hr_department hd ON hd.DEPT_CODE = he2.DEPT_CODE JOIN hr_position hp ON hp.POS_CODE = he2.POS_CODE;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hr_email
WHERE mail_to = #{empNo} AND MAIL_STATUS = 'Y'
WHERE mail_to = #{empNo} AND MAIL_STATUS = 'N'
